item.title: Elm Architecture
item.description: main value is what gets shown on screen. Think of it as the high-level description of our program. main = Browser.

item.title: Good Enough Software
item.description: Ben Franklin says that your knowledge and experience are your most important day-to-day professional asset. Depreciating assets. New techniques, languages, and environments are being developed as we speak and the ever changing market can render your experience into irrelevancy.

item.title: Addiction
item.description: This blog post explores a highly personal topic that rarely comes up in my daily conversations - however, it reveals a ton about me and I feel like writing about it.

item.title: Transferring to Math
item.description: After spending 2 years studying accounting and financial management, I’ve decided to transfer into a new program

item.title: Deep Work
item.description: There’s an obsession with ‘productivity’ for productivity’s sake; to me, deep work aims at the core of what it means to be productive and work on important things that take serious concentration.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi. My penname is Cafwin. I consume & reflect often, so why not blog it? I practice pragmatic programming & deep work.
